newsitem.title: JAPAN: INSIGHT - JGBs poised for slight break above 125.24.
newsitem.headline: INSIGHT - JGBs poised for slight break above 125.24.

text.p: FUTURE RANGE/DAY SPPRT RSTNC RSI-9 MA-5 MA-25
OUTLOOK OF BOJ OPERATION AT 0020 GMT: NO OPERATION EXPECTED
*Key September 10-year JGB futures are seen edging higher on Friday, supported by a view that BOJ will keep interest rates steady for some time, and by investors' buying on dips.
*After ending on LIFFE at 125.22, September is set to breach key resistance of 125.24, but upside is seen limited ahead of three-day weekend and next week's 10-year JGB auction.
